alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 6:54PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Gusty west to northwest wind from tonight into Sunday morning... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph, with locally higher winds in the mountain areas. * WHERE...Eastern sides of the Absaroka and Wind River Mountains into the Clark, Cody, Dubois, and Red Canyon areas. * WHEN...From 11 PM tonight through around noon Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong crosswinds at times will make travel hazardous for light- and high-profile vehicles, especially along highway 120 north of Cody, highway 14 east of Cody, and highway 28 around Red Canyon.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
